Text:
Love this film only as the info does state this is the US version of the film, please if anyone has the European edit then put it up - it is sooooo much better
thanks

If you want to download this one, the quality is good and downloads in about 48 hours.
SEED PLEASE! Please don't just DL and close......
There is a torrent for this movie on Mininova which is the full version (sourced from US dvd and UK VHS) plus a small featurette "Beauties And Beasts".
